title: Maxway Vibes: Taiwan’s Botique Steel Factory
content:
As a follow-up to Daniel Yang’s Shop Visits to Taiwanese framebuilders he penned for us last year, he returned to Taiwan last week to document various manufacturers in a video series. Here’s a look inside Maxway’s facilities. Chances are, your favorite steel bike company might make its frames there!

The post Maxway Vibes: Taiwan’s Botique Steel Factory appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
